serversJson.title: The Collection
serversJson.parText: The collection was born and is inspired by the real story that Matti goes through with this cancer.
serversJson.destails1: - The elements such as surgery, chemotherapy, radiotherapy, the hairless period will keep the chronology and proportion from reality.
serversJson.destails2: - Each artwork is original and completely hand drawn with its own color palette according to the toys, clothes, and medical items that Matti uses.
serversJson.destails3: - One time collection with this story.
serversJson.destails4: - The collection also has 55 very rare pieces specially designed, one for each week of cnad Matti fights this disease.
serversJson.destails6: When you purchase a eHOPEwarriors NFT, the art is totally and completely yours.
serversJson.destails7: - eHOPEwarriors are available as high resolution, 5,000px by 5,000px JPEGs. This allows you to print a high-quality physical copy of your NFT, display it in high res on a screen, and use it for large-scale print or display.
